name: Easy-Pilot Ltd.
about: Easy-Pilot Ltd., based in Budapest, Hungary, is a leading EASA-approved Approved Training Organization (ATO) dedicated to making flight training simple, efficient, and accessible. Founded and managed by active professional pilots, Easy-Pilot specializes in EASA exams and license conversions. The school offers comprehensive, flexible, and innovative training programs, supported by a team of knowledgeable instructors and a proactive administrative staff. With a focus on practical knowledge and real-life examples, Easy-Pilot ensures students receive personalized attention and mentorship, resulting in a 92% exam success rate. Their global student base benefits from regularly scheduled online classes, a vast test question bank, and convenient exam centers worldwide. Easy-Pilot is committed to providing high-quality education and support, fostering a supportive and encouraging atmosphere for aspiring pilots.
services: ["EASA Aerobatic Flight Training\nLicense Conversion\nATPL Theory Course"]
